title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: The localization key is required to display externalized text in the chart title. If the key is left blank, the text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
OB: Currently, when attempting to display a chart with a blank key in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank but a valid value is provided, the text should still be able to be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the localization key blank and provide a valid value in the properties file.
3. Observe that the text is not displayed in the chart title.
